description: A modern website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS

overview.title: Project Overview
overview.description1: This is a modern website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It includes features like internationalization (i18n), responsive design, and code quality tools like ESLint and Prettier.
overview.description2: The website is built using the Next.js App Router, which provides a file-system based router built on top of Server Components.

structure.title: Project Structure
structure.description: The project follows a modular structure to keep the codebase organized and maintainable:

tech.title: Technologies
tech.nextjs: Next.js: React framework for production with App Router
tech.typescript: TypeScript: Static type checking for JavaScript
tech.i18n: i18n: Internationalization with support for English and Swedish

start.title: Getting Started
start.prereqDesc: Make sure you have Node.js installed on your machine.
start.available: The application will be available at

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: The website supports multiple languages using Next.js App Router's built-in internationalization features. Currently, the following languages are supported:
